body.p: I regret to assure you in reply to your letter, that I cannot comply with the request Unidentified preferred in it. I stand already pledged to as many demands on my time and attention as can be reasonably recognizedCD had just published the second volume of Our Mutual Friend, and was preparing the Christmas number of All the Year Round, to which he contributed the ghost story "To Be Taken with a Grain of Salt".
